function
Class TabularFunction

java.lang.Object
  function.FunctionEvaluator
      function.TabularFunction

public class TabularFunction
extends FunctionEvaluator

Tabular Function, implementation of abstract Function Evaluator.
Used for discrete functions.

Author:
Michele Roncalli

costTable

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> costTable
Correspondence between parameters and function values.
The parameters are represented in a String.

Method Detail

addParametersCost

public void addParametersCost(NodeArgument[] params,
                              double cost)
Save the function value for NodeArgument[] of parameter.
The params become the key of the cost table. A string is builded, where each parameter is followed by a ";".

Specified by:
addParametersCost in class FunctionEvaluator
Parameters:
params - the array of NodeArgument
cost - the cost for the params
